entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Leamington
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:57 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Cloudy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High plus 1.
